response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you could be even greater. I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value and my desire to see this product go to someone who appreciates it as much as I do. I trust this offer will be appealing to you, given its value to you is estimated at $1,200,000. Let's make this a win-win transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
